definitions.body: be afraid of, sq. [[מִפְּנֵי]] Nu 22:3, De 1:17, 1Sa 18:15, [[גּוּרוּ לָכֶם מִפְּנֵי]] Job 19:29; c. [[מִן]] Job 41:17, De 18:22; c. acc. De 32:27 (poet.) Ho 10:5 rd. prob. [[ינודו]] lament (‖[[אבל]], used c. [[לְ]] e.g. Na 3:7, Je 15:5 al.; cf. Che).
stand in awe of, sq. [[מִן]] Ps 22:24, Ps 33:8 ([[יׇרֵא]]).
